wikipedia_page.main:
Peter Allen Westgarth  was the chief executive, The Duke of Edinburgh's Award (DofE) and former chief executive of Young Enterprise UK, Oxford. In 2006, he was awarded the Queen's Award for Enterprise Promotion.The Queen’s Award for Enterprise Promotion", (21 April 2006). The London Gazette,  Supplement No. 1, pS5. Retrieved 23 November 2015.</ref>
Westgarth joined The Duke of Edinburgh's Award in 2005 and oversaw a complete rebrand, leaving in 2019. He was appointed Commander of the Royal Victorian Order (CVO) in the 2020 New Year Honours.

response: * Peter Westgarth, chief executive, The Duke of Edinburgh's Award Scheme and former chief executive of Young Enterprise UK, Oxford.
